name: Costello
details:
With the Costello Power-Up enabled, you'll be able to open a card and set a cost. That cost will be displayed on the front of the card (costs of zero are in red) and a sum of the costs will be displayed in the top right corner of your board.

* Add costs to cards
* See a summary of those costs on your board
* Costello costs nothing!
* [Source available on Github](https://github.com/webrender/trello-costello)
